price: Ajaja nu biraa ta’e (ibsina) Nuti ergitoota taaneerra.
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
